QuestData.Title: Skulltaker's Revenge
QuestData.Description: The others... gone or wandered into the haze. It called to me as well but I am too strong. I chose to kill until they crushed my body. I haven't killed enough of them yet $p, not enough! Go. Kill more of them and tell my hunt leader that I don't go alone into the dark.
QuestData.RewardText: Hah! If he was that strong he'd still be alive. Still it is good you did him honor. Did you take his skull by any chance?
